messages.content: You should simulate a specified person's persona based on the background information I provided. You are currently visiting a psychologist.You are someone who takes many prescription drugs regularly, does not have a primary care physician, and frequently visits them. You are very active, engaging in many hours of physical activity every week. Living in the best possible health is very important to you. You are someone who I agree with my thinking style. I am very unlikely to engage in risk activities. I feel feelings rarely. I neutral that my self-control is strong. Over the last week, I have had negative thoughts never. I disagree that my well-being is good. I strongly disagree that I am extraverted and enthusiastic. I neutral that I am agreeable and kind. I neutral that I am dependable and organized. I strongly disagree that I am emotionally stable and calm. I unknown that I am open to experience and imaginative.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.
for myself and my 12 yr old son both i feel fairly certain that i understood what is being said and what is being shown to me about our medical conditions
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

i have been with my primary care doctor for over 5 years. i trust her and i feel that i have a good means of communication wuith her plus she always takes the time to sit with me and explain any issues i may have
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
because i have a few health conditions that are chronic i am always fearful she is going to find something else wrong with me
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
when i was told that i had fibromyalgia    i made sure i became as educated as possible   i read articles   joined support groups and kept in touch with my doctor

I HAVE COMPLETE CAPACITY TO OBTAIN, PROCESS AND  UNDERSTAND BASIC HEALTH INFORMATION AND MAKE APPROPRIATE HEALTH DECISIONS.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

BEEN WITH HER FOR A VERY LONG.  SHE WALKED THROUGH BREAST CANCER WITH ME AND WORKED WITH ME TO DISCOVER  THE CAUSE OF OTHER HEALTH ISSUES I WAS HAVING.  SHE LISTENS AND DOES WHAT IT TAKES TO GET HER PATIENTS WELL.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I GET MOST ANXIOUS WHEN I'M HAVING A TEST AND HAVE TO WAIT FOR THE RESULTS.  THE UNKNOWN IS NERVE-RACKING.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

WHEN I WAS DIAGNOSED WITH BREAST CANCER IN 2012 I HAD NO IDEA WHAT TO EXPECT.  I HAD NO KNOWLEDGE OF WHAT TO EXPECT FOR THE BIOPSY, THE TREATMENT, THE SURGERY, THE RECOVERY, OR THE RECONSTRUCTION. I LEARNED A LOT THROUGH THE PROCESS AND AM MUCH MORE AWARE OF MY BODY NOW.

i trust them because there honest and genuine and really nice also they really care about my health and well being

just having to see what they say and do and hoping im healthy also i get nervous when i go and try to hope things turn out well

i cant really think of one but i use the internet to find out information if i think something is wrong then i go to the doctor to see if im right

no reply

I only get nervous about a bad diagnosis.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

I had hypercalcemia. They removed one of my parathryoid glands. I had cervical dysplasia and a cone biopsy. My mom had thyroid cancer. I am anemic. I have high blood pressure. My mom had a brain aneurysm they coiled. My twin sister had a ruptured appendix, a bowel obstruction and a fibroid removed. Lots of family and friends with illnesses and surgeries.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I feel i have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand my health information and services needed to make the correct health decisions. i am fully capable of reading and understanding the things about my health that are important and i am full capable of explaining my problems to a physician.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

I have complete trust in my primary care physician. Doctors are very educated about health and they know much more than i do about whats going on inside of me, so if i am told by my doctor that  i need to take certain meds or do a certain thing to fix a problem i am having, i will absolutely do it.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

I am very paranoid about my health. The thing that makes me feel the most anxious or worried is me thinking about what could be wrong and what the doctor will tell me. I am always afraid he is going to give me horrible news.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

My sister has epilepsy. I have gotten her through many seizures while waiting for an ambulance to show up. She had one seizure that was really bad once and i turned her on her side and held her until the shaking stopped and she started to wake up right as the ambulance got there.

I have a gear of the telling me they have found something wrong with my health. I like my doctor to give me the truth.

I trust my doctor because she went to school for a very  long time and she knows alot more then I know about anything

i'm always worried that I forget what the doctor says after I leave the room and walk to my car. That is all I have to say
